pageContext.description: Dimensions: max. dim. 52.5mm; min. T. 1.5; max. T. 2.6; Wt. 13.7g,Typology: stretch of edge unbroken with rounded cross-section,Manufacture: faces fairly evenly flat, but one or two very slight moulded ridges,Condition: Slight twisting & bending of plate; most edges broken.,Attached Material: whitish silt traces on break
pageContext.surface: Mainly dull gold surface; traces of dark brown layer overlying.
pageContext.collection: Gibson, Mr. D. J. - private (13),115 Hurstcourt Rd., Sutton, Surrey
